organic.title: How to make a cup of tea? - Whittock Consulting
organic.snippet: 1. Fill up the kettle with water · 2. Boil the kettle · 3. Place a teabag in your favourite mug · 4. Pour boiling water into your favourite mug · 5. Brew the tea ...

organic.title: How to make a cup of tea in 10 seconds
organic.snippet: It takes less than 10 seconds to make a cup of loose tea. To make a cup of loose tea can be as easy as filling your own teabag and heating it in the microwave.
